item.title: 【Off-Topic】I wanna donate to this site but I can't
item.description:
Hi, I'm live in korea , I've been using this site well for almost two or three years

So.... I'm so embarrassed and sorry to donate now

But in this country where I live, I can't donate through PayPal, so I want to know if I can donate in any other way

And I really hope this site stays here for a long time

Thank you
item.author: wj040748

item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - William Orbit - Starbeam EP - Dolby Atmos [E-AC-3 JOC 768kbps 16bit/48kHz]
item.description:
William Orbit - Starbeam EP

Released: 2021
Genre: Dance/Electronic
Source: Apple Music Rip



I Found this artist/album while searching literally "best albums in dolby atmos". This is an EP with one long song - hope its alright to put in the album section. I am currently giving this a listen to and its pretty groovy! Definitely a good surround sound mix.

From his wikipedia - it looks like this guy has been involved in the production of a lot of popular music that has won him many awards.

William Mark Wainwright (born 15 December 1956),[1] known professionally as William Orbit, is an English musician and record producer who has sold 200 million recordings worldwide of his own work, his production and song-writing work.[2][3] He is a recipient of multiple Grammy Awards, Ivor Novello Awards and other music industry awards.

1 – Starbeam
2 – Wordsworth
3 – Diso
4 – Águilas
5 – Starbeam (Extended Mix by Shocklee)
6 – Águilas (Instrumental Mix)

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Far East Movement - Free Wired (Japan Version) lossless
item.description:
Hi there,

Have been searching for a rare(ish) release of the Japanese version of Free Wired by Far East Movement. Anybody have a copy they could provide to me in lossless? Even if it's just the bonus tracks Make It Bump and the remix

Only streaming link I could find of this version:

Discogs: https://www.discogs.com/release/15497893-Far-East-Movement-Free-Wired
item.author: wheatthincabbage
